title: [K-12] Mixed Reality and Gamification-Based VR Learning Design for Wine Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic wine terminology and understanding of food-culture dynamics
context.additional_context: Requires implementing a blended learning environment using smartphone-based VR content in constrained technology settings. Applies phased gamification to minimize learner resistance.

learning_goals: Learners can identify the flavor characteristics of five major grape varieties in a VR environment with 80% accuracy.
Learners achieve a score of 4 or higher (out of 5) in a wine tasting simulation three consecutive times using gamification elements.
Learners perform wine service procedures in a blended reality learning environment with 90% completion accuracy through parallel VR/physical experiments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
